ygData.msgSnippet: Terrorsaur/Rowdy Wolf: From what I was told, bring him back to base. Terrorsaur replied to KitKat. I don t like the idea that he could blow our heads off

Terrorsaur/Rowdy Wolf:





"From what I was told, bring him back to base." Terrorsaur replied to 
KitKat. "I don't like the idea that he could blow our heads off though. But 
I don't have an argument over a conflict." He laughed breifly.

He put his scanners on, now passing the last marker. Ahead was a formation 
of a cave. Or what looked like one. This may be the wolf's shelter. He 
transformed to robot mode and withdrew his gun. "Stand-by." he said to 
KitKat through his comm-link. "I think we're here."



Rowdy Wolf turned his head and sniffed the air. "I smell something," he said 
to Zyber. He lifted his lips from his upper row of teeth. "More like 
someone.

"Rowdy Wolf, terrorize." he commanded his activation code. It was the first 
time he transformed using the phase. He withdrew his rifle from under his 
heavy furs, and stepped out of his cave.
